00027 // DATA TYPES
00028 typedef enum
00029 {
00030     EBrowserOverSettingsSmallScreen = 0,
00031     EBrowserOverSettingsAutoLoadImages,
00032     EBrowserOverSettingsFontSize,
00033     EBrowserOverSettingsFullScreen,
00034     EBrowserOverSettingsCustomAp,
00035     EBrowserOverSettingsUndefinied = KMaxTUint16
00036 } TBrowserOverSettings;
00037 
00038 typedef enum 
00039 {
00040   EBrowserOverFontSizeLevelAllSmall = 0,
00041   EBrowserOverFontSizeLevelSmaller,
00042   EBrowserOverFontSizeLevelNormal,
00043   EBrowserOverFontSizeLevelLarger,    
00044   EBrowserOverFontSizeLevelAllLarge,
00045   EBrowserOverFontSizeLevelUndefined = KMaxTUint16

00047

00063 class TBrowserOverriddenSettings
00064 {
00065 public :// Constructors and destructor 
00066    inline TBrowserOverriddenSettings();
00067 
00068 public: // New functions
00075    inline void SetBrowserSetting(TBrowserOverSettings aBrowserSetting, TUint aValue);
00081    inline TUint GetBrowserSetting(TBrowserOverSettings aBrowserSetting);
00082 private:// Data
00083    //stores the value for the small screen setting can be 0 or 1
00084    //if not set then KMaxUint
00085    TUint iSmallScreen;
00086    //stores the value for the auto load image setting can be 0 or 1
00087    //if not set then KMaxUint
00088    TUint iAutoLoadImage;
00089    //stores the value for the font size setting can be 0,1,2,3 or 4
00090    TUint iFontSize;
00091    //stores the value for the small screen setting can be 0 or 1
00092    TUint iFullScreen;
00093    // Custom access point provided by the operator. If specified, contains an id of a read only
00094    // access point what is then set as default  and it cannot be changed manually. If not 
00095    // defined, operator menu works as before.
00096    // from operator menu( 0 - not specified, otherwise contains the access point id)
00097    TUint iCustomAp;
00098 };
